text: Doru Spînu is a retired water polo player from Romania. Spînu competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics and the 1980 Summer Olympics. He was born on 23 August 1955.Doru Spînu == References == Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian water polo players Category:Olympians for Romania Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest
title: Doru Spînu
